name: windsurf-development
description: Complete Grievance Portal with MVC architecture and MySQL - 100% parity with Supabase version

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: cd windsurf-backend && npm test || echo 'Backend tests not configured'
scripts.test:frontend: cd windsurf-frontend && npm test || echo 'Frontend tests not configured'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd windsurf-backend && npm run lint || echo 'Backend linting not configured'
scripts.lint:frontend: cd windsurf-frontend && npm run lint || echo 'Frontend linting not configured'

author: Windsurf Development Team
